entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 16. Forecast issued 12:22 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:22 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
